specialAbilities.name: Poor Compartmentalization
specialAbilities.description: Take double fire and flooding from all damage.

specialAbilities.name: Air and Space
specialAbilities.description: All allied jets within 15" of Intrepid gain 3 ACC. If a jet is within 12" of Intrepid, Intrepid gains 3 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Moonlit Model
specialAbilities.description: If Hornet is carrying no aircraft, gain +6 ARM.

specialAbilities.name: Sister Sara
specialAbilities.description: When within 8" of an allied carrier, both Saratoga and that carrier's aicraft gain +1 ACC and +1 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: The Last Battleship
specialAbilities.description: Other ships in Iowa's Formation gain +2 ACC

specialAbilities.name: Temper, Temper
specialAbilities.description:
Start the game with one 'TEMPER' Marker. After taking damage from a ship, place the 
'TEMPER' Marker on the attacking ship. The 'TEMPER' Marker remains on that ship until 
Wisconson sinks, or the ship sinks, where the 'TEMPER' Marker will be returned to Wisconson. 
Wisconson gains +2 ACC in attacks against a ship with the TEMPER marker.

specialAbilities.name: Ching's Legacy
specialAbilities.description:
When rolling damage for attacks from USS Washington, roll and additional damage die and drop 
the lowest roll. When undamaged, +2 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Battleship X
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ARM for every hazard marker on South Dakota.

specialAbilities.name: The Gold Standard
specialAbilities.description:
If another ship in your fleet has the same MAN and SPEED as Colorado, both that ship and 
Colorado gain +1 ACC and +1 ARM.

specialAbilities.name: The Unsinkable Battleship
specialAbilities.description: Gain +3 EVA and +3 ARM against Air and Missile Attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Flagship of the Asiatic Fleet
specialAbilities.description: Allied CLs and DDs within 8" of Houston gain +1 EVA and +1 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Ghost of Buffalo
specialAbilities.description: Gain +3 EVA if within 3" of a coastline.

specialAbilities.name: Memories of The Slot.
specialAbilities.description: When Honalulu is within an enemy's torpedo range, gain +3 ACC against that enemy.

specialAbilities.name: Air Defender
specialAbilities.description: Gain +3 ACC in screening attacks for an allied ship.

specialAbilities.name: La Fayette
specialAbilities.description:
For the sake of fleet building and abilities, Langley's nationality can be considered either 
US or French. Aircraft gain +2 EVA from AA reaction fire from Battleships.

specialAbilities.name: A Fighting Ship
specialAbilities.description: Johnston gains +1 ACC and +2 EVA for every enemy ship within 9".

specialAbilities.name: DesRon Leader
specialAbilities.description: Torpedo attacks from Edwards and allied ships within 6" gain +1 POW against battleships.

specialAbilities.name: Ariake
specialAbilities.description:
For the sake of fleet building and abilities, Edwards's nationality can be considered either 
US or Japanese.

specialAbilities.name: Divine Shield:
specialAbilities.description: When attacked by aircraft, gain +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: The Ship that Would Not Die
specialAbilities.description: When hit, roll twice on the damage table and use the least severe roll.

specialAbilities.name: Hiddensee Guardian
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ACC when within 3" of an ally that has lost half or more of its integrity.

specialAbilities.name: Fight Like a Battleship
specialAbilities.description: When attacked by enemies within 6" of Samuel B Roberts, gain +4 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Bastion of Defiance
specialAbilities.description: Non-US Allied Units within 12" of Regan gain +2 EVA

specialAbilities.name: Desperate Valor
specialAbilities.description: Cole cannot take > 2 damage from one attack. Remove twice as many hazards in the DC phase.

specialAbilities.name: Pacific Patriot
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ACC for every allied ship within 5".

specialAbilities.name: Pax Propter Vim
specialAbilities.description: If undamaged, Zumwalt gains +1 ACC, +1 EVA, and +1 POW.

specialAbilities.name: Interceptor
specialAbilities.description: Gain +4 ACC against air units and missiles with >10 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Spirit of Camraderie
specialAbilities.description:
If you have an Australian ship in your fleet, Canberra and the closest Australian ship both gain 
+1 EVA and +1 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: To The Last
specialAbilities.description: If another Aircraft Carrier is in your fleet, Zuikaku gains +5 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Pride of Carrier Divison 1
specialAbilities.description: When attacking a targets with two of Akagi's aircraft at the same time, add +1 ACC to each attack.

specialAbilities.name: Dragon of the Reformed Task Force
specialAbilities.description: If Unryu is the only carrier in your fleet, Unryu gains +3 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Defiant Phonix
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 ARM if no allied warships are within 5" of Taihou.

specialAbilities.name: Star of the Combined Fleet
specialAbilities.description: Allied Japanese ships within 12" of Yamato gain +1 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: 1st Fleet Flagship
specialAbilities.description: Any ship in formation with Nagato gains +1 ACC and +2 ARM.

specialAbilities.name: Calculated Punch
specialAbilities.description:
When attacking enemy battleships, add +4 POW to Kirishima’s attack, but reduce 
the result of that roll by one damage.

specialAbilities.name: Reconnaissance Master
specialAbilities.description: Aircraft Launched by Tone have a spotting range of 18 inches, instead of 15.

specialAbilities.name: Carrier Killer
specialAbilities.description: Chikuma gains +2 ACC when attacking enemy carriers.

specialAbilities.name: Inspiring Presence
specialAbilities.description: If an enemy has the most expensive ship in the battlefield, Ships within 5" of Atago gain +1 POW.

specialAbilities.name: Charge in!
specialAbilities.description: Instant torpedo attacks gain +2 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Idol of the Fleet
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ACC and +1 EVA for every friendly Destroyer or Frigate within 12".

specialAbilities.name: Destroyer Leader
specialAbilities.description: All Allied DD's within 8" gain +1 EVA and +1 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Deadly Serenity
specialAbilities.description: In Ramming attacks, Tatsua gains +5 ARM and +5 POW.

specialAbilities.name: Prancing Dragon
specialAbilities.description: Ryuujou's aircraft gain +3 EVA when within 10" of any transport.

specialAbilities.name: Dark Luck
specialAbilities.description:
Whenever an allied ship sinks, place that ship's figure on Shigure's card. 
Shigure gains +2 EVA for every figure on her card.

specialAbilities.name: Shifting Tide
specialAbilities.description: If within 3" of a friendly carrier, gain +5 EVA

specialAbilities.name: The Up-to-date Destroyer
specialAbilities.description: Sazanami gains +3 ACC if within 8" of an allied steelHulled unit.

specialAbilities.name: Charging Forward
specialAbilities.description: If the closest allied ship has more than 4 hazard markers, gain +2 ACC and +1 POW

specialAbilities.name: Nightmare of Solomon
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ACC for every enemy ship within 11".

specialAbilities.name: Ferocious Escort
specialAbilities.description: If within 8" of a friendly transport or CV, Izumo's aircraft gain +2 EVA and +2 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Savior of Sasebo
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 ACC for every hostile aircraft within 12" of Kongou.

specialAbilities.name: The New JMSDF
specialAbilities.description: If within 5" of a shipgirl, gain +2 ACC and +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Ruthless Pursuit
specialAbilities.description: Ark Royale's aircraft gain +3 EVA against warships that have no allies within 6".

specialAbilities.name: USS Robin
specialAbilities.description:
Victorious can be deployed with US Aircraft. If a US Carrier is also in your fleet, then both Victorius 
and the US Carrier gain +1 ARM.

specialAbilities.name: Just Pursuit
specialAbilities.description: Rodney gains +1 ACC for every hazard marker (excluding fires and flooding) on her target.

specialAbilities.name: The Nelson Touch
specialAbilities.description:
If an enemy is within 10" of Nelson, gain +1 ACC.
If an enemy is within 8" of Nelson, gain +2 ARM.
If an enemy is within 5" of Nelson, gain +3 POW.
If an enemy is within 3" of Nelson, gain +6 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Royal Guardian
specialAbilities.description: Friendly battleships within 5" of KGV gain +1 ARMOR.

specialAbilities.name: Just Contempt
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 ACC when attacking enemies greater then 14" away from Warspite.

specialAbilities.name: Deft Maneuvering
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 EVA against torpedo attacks.

specialAbilities.name: A Maid's Duty
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 POW against BBs.

specialAbilities.name: Steppe Agility
specialAbilities.description: When attacked by a BB, tread damage rolls as if Cossack has 5 armor.

specialAbilities.name: Relaxed Resiliency
specialAbilities.description:
Gain +1 ACC against enemies with 5 or less integrity. Gain +1 ARM when attacked by enemies with 
5 or less integrity.

specialAbilities.name: Diamond of the Isles
specialAbilities.description: All allied Steel-hulled ships within 9" gain +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Welsh Defiance
specialAbilities.description: When attacked by an enemy with higher INT than Dragon, gain +1 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Surface Raider
specialAbilities.description: When attacking a unit with a lower cost then Graf Zeppelin, attack with +1 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Terror of the Seas
specialAbilities.description: If Bismarck is the only battleships in your fleet, all of your other ships gain +1 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: The Prince's Luck
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 EVA and +1 ACC if Prinz Eugen is within 8" of an allied BB.

specialAbilities.name: Lessons of Wikinger
specialAbilities.description: Z1 Gains +2 EVA if an aircraft is within 8".

specialAbilities.name: Max's Dicipline'
specialAbilities.description: Z3 Gains +3 ACC if in a formation of 3 or more ships.

specialAbilities.name: Fresh Frigate
specialAbilities.description: While undamaged, Rheinland-Pfalz gains +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Ambassidor of Liberté
specialAbilities.description: If a Non-French Allied Unit is within 12" of Richelieu, gain +2 ACC

specialAbilities.name: Death or Glory
specialAbilities.description: +2 ACC against enemies with more INT then Glorie.

specialAbilities.name: Contre-torpilleur
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ACC when attacking ships with equal or less INT then Mogador.

specialAbilities.name: The Guardian Admiral
specialAbilities.description: If within 3" of a friendly carrier, gain +5 EVA

specialAbilities.name: Republican Guardian
specialAbilities.description: Gain +4 ACC when attacking ships of 4 INT or less.

specialAbilities.name: Eagle's First Flight
specialAbilities.description: Start the game with one of Aquila's aircraft launched, with zero energy.

specialAbilities.name: Dependable Lictor
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ARM for every enemy aircraft within 15" of Italia.

specialAbilities.name: Flagship of the Marina Militare
specialAbilities.description: Italian and UK ships within 8" of Duca degli Abruzzi gain +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Breeze from the North-East
specialAbilities.description: Grecale gains +1 EVA for every friendly DD within 8".

specialAbilities.name: Ready to Relax
specialAbilities.description: Scirocco gains +2 ACC if within 5" of a BB.

specialAbilities.name: Revolutionary Support
specialAbilities.description: Shore bombardments hit on a 5 instead of a 6.

specialAbilities.name: The Blue Beauty
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 ARMOR against attacks from aircraft.

specialAbilities.name: Rushed Deployment
specialAbilities.description: Admiral Kuznetsov starts the game with one of their aircraft launched.

specialAbilities.name: Emperess of the North
specialAbilities.description:
If the Pyotr Velikiy is the most expensive ship on the table, all allied ships within 8" of Pyotr Velikiy 
gain +2 ACC and +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: The Viking of Vladivostok
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 EVA and +2 ARM if no allies are within 8".

specialAbilities.name: Artic Guardian
specialAbilities.description: Gain +2 ACC if within 2" of a coastline.

specialAbilities.name: Domesticlly Buit
specialAbilities.description: If you only have Russian units in your fleet, Admiral Golovko gains +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: The New Frigate
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 ACC for every additional FFG in your fleet.

specialAbilities.name: The Fightingest Ship of the RCN
specialAbilities.description: For every Allied ship within 6" of Hadia, gain +1 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Pacific Guardian
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 EVA for every Japanese, American, or Australian ship within 8".

specialAbilities.name: Surabaya Survivor
specialAbilities.description: Gain +1 EVA and +1 POW for every enemy within 12" of Martadinata.

specialAbilities.name: Amphion
specialAbilities.description:
For the sake of fleet building and abilities, Perth's nationality can be considered either 
Australian or United Kingdom. Gain +1 EVA for every ship of unique nationality in your fleet.

specialAbilities.name: ABDA Legacy
specialAbilities.description: US, AUS, and UK Ships within 8" of De Reuter gain +2 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Gotland's Gaze
specialAbilities.description:
Once per game, you may place a 'gaze' marker on the card of an enemy ship spotted by Gotland's 
floatplanes. For the rest of the game, all attacks against this ship gain +2 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Poor Compartmentalization
specialAbilities.description: Take double fire and flooding from all damage.
